mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice (notice_title, notice_content, member_id) value (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select m.member_nickname, n.id, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_status, n.member_id, n.created_date from tbl_member m join tbl_notice n on m.id = n.member_id where m.member_type = '관리자' and notice_status = '정상' order by n.id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount}
select COUNT(*) from tbl_notice where notice_status = '정상'
